name.baseName: cement production;cement, ordinary portland cement;new dry process precalciner kiln, 4000 t/d;granulated blast furnace slag
水泥生产;水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥;新型干法预分解窑, 4000 t/d;粒化高炉矿渣

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The new dry pre-decomposition cement production model is selected.
选用了预分解窑干法水泥生产模型。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This article selects a pre-decomposition kiln-drying cement production model. The new dry pre-decomposition cement production technology is based on suspension preheating and pre-decomposition technology. It is a production technology that is more in line with environmental protection requirements and meets high productivity requirements, and has become the future development trend of China's cement industry. Therefore, the selection of new dry pre-decomposition cement production technology as cement model production technology has advanced and environmentally friendly requirements.
本文选用预分解窑干法水泥生产模型。新型干法预分解水泥生产技术以悬浮预热和预分解技术为核心，是一种比较符合环保要求、符合高生产率要求的生产技术，成为中国水泥行业未来的发展趋势。故选用新型干法预分解水泥生产技术作为水泥模型生产技术具有先进性和环保性需求。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The ordinary Portland cement produced via a new dry process precalciner kiln is intended for construction purposes, serving as a fundamental component in concrete for buildings, infrastructures like bridges, roads, and in commercial and residential structures. This new production technology is environmentally sensitive and is becoming the standard in the cement industry due to its high productivity and compatibility with environmental requirements.
新型干法预分解窑生产的普通硅酸盐水泥主要用于建筑用途，作为混凝土的基本成分，用于建筑物、如桥梁、道路等基础设施以及商业和住宅结构。这种新的生产技术环境敏感，由于其高生产力和符合环境要求，正在成为水泥工业的标准。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The life cycle functional unit is selected as 1t of cement to construct the life cycle model.The cement industry system boundary includes the production of cement, the production and transportation of raw materials, and the production of electricity, but does not include the use and processing of cement.For auxiliary materials such as slag, only the transportation and preparation process will be considered, and the production process will not be considered.
选用生命周期功能单位为 1t 水泥来构建生命周期模型。水泥工业系统边界包括水泥的生产、原材料的生产与运输、电力的生产，不包括水泥的使用和处理。对于矿渣等辅助材料只考虑其交通运输和准备过程，不考虑其生产过程。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Using GaBi4 professional life cycle assessment software, a life cycle model will be established to conduct a life cycle assessment of cement. GaBi4 software will be utilized to divide the entire life cycle of cement into five major modules, with each module being a plan model. Each plan model will include data inputs for various stages of cement production.
运用GaBi4专业生命周期评价软件，建立生命周期模型，进行水泥生命周期评价。利用GaBi4软件将整个水泥生命周期分为五大模块，每个模块为一个plan模型。每个plan模型中包括水泥生产的各个阶段数据输入。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Pollutant emission data from limestone and gypsum mining come from the China Life Cycle Reference Database (CLCD). Due to the lack of mining data for clay and iron ore and the small amount of mining, the pollutant emission data from limestone mining were used as estimates. The pollutant emission data from coal mining adopt the raw coal mining data from the China Life Cycle Reference Database (CLCD).The power production pollutant emission data uses the national average grid power mixing and transmission data from the China Life Cycle Reference Database (CLCD).The transportation stage considers the transportation of all raw materials required for cement production, including limestone, clay, iron powder, gypsum, coal and industrial waste. For the convenience of calculation, a diesel truck with a load of 10t on highway transportation is taken as an example. It is assumed that the average transportation of all raw materials The distance is 100km. The pollutant emission inventory data of diesel trucks with a load of 10 tons in the China Life Cycle Reference Data (CLCD) are used.

石灰石、石膏开采中污染物排放数据来自于中国生命周期参考数据库（CLCD）。由于缺乏粘土和铁矿石的开采数据，且其开采量较少，故采用石灰石的开采污染物排放数据作为估算。煤炭开采的污染物排放数据采用中国生命周期参考数据库（CLCD）中的原煤开采数据。电力生产污染物排放数据采用中国生命周期参考数据库（CLCD）中的全国平均电网电力混合与传输数据。运输阶段考虑水泥生产所需要所有原材料的运输，包括石灰石、粘上、铁粉、石膏、煤以及工业废弃物，为计算方便以载重10t的柴油货车高速公路运输为例，假定所有原材料的运输平均距离为100km。采用中国生命周期参考数据（CLCD）中载重10t的柴油货车污染物排放清单数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 徐小宁. (2013). 中国水泥工业的生命周期评价 [硕士, 大连理工大学].
徐小宁. (2013). 中国水泥工业的生命周期评价 [硕士, 大连理工大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should apply this data set to assess the environmental footprint of ordinary Portland cement production. Attention must be given to the specified system boundary which includes raw material production, transportation, and electricity generation, but excludes the use and disposal of cement. For auxiliary materials like granulated blast furnace slag, only transportation and preparation processes should be accounted for. The data should be utilized within the framework of GaBi4 professional life cycle assessment software, where the life cycle has been divided into distinct plan models representing various production stages. When considering the environmental impact of industrial waste, only the transportation and preparation processes are to be included, with the production impact responsibility residing with the waste generator. Assume an average transportation distance of 100km for all materials in any life cycle modelling.

用户应使用此数据集来评估普通硅酸盐水泥生产的环境足迹。必须注意指定的系统边界，该系统边界包括原材料的生产、运输和电力生成，但不包括水泥的使用和处理。对于粒化高炉矿渣等辅助材料，只应计算运输和准备过程。数据应在GaBi4专业生命周期评价软件框架内使用，在该软件中，生命周期已被划分为代表不同生产阶段的不同plan模型。在考虑工业废弃物的环境影响时，只应包括运输和准备过程，产生废弃物的生产影响责任属于废弃物生成者。在任何生命周期建模中，假设所有材料的平均运输距离为100公里。

completeness.common:other: Only the transport and preparation process of industrial waste is considered, and the environmental impact of the production of industrial waste is borne by the producer who generated it.
只考虑工业废弃物的运输和准备过程，生产工业废弃物的环境影响由产生该废弃物的生产者承担。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Limestone
石灰石
Clay
粘土
Iron powder
铁粉
Gypsum. The standard values of GB-175-2007 General Portland Cement in China are used for each component of the cement.
石膏。各通用水泥组分使用中国GB-175-2007通用硅酸盐水泥标准值。

Coal. The statistical values of Chinese production lines are used, and the standard coal consumption for large and medium-sized precalciner kilns is 114 kg/t clinker. The coal consumption can also be calculated based on the chemical composition of coal ash and the industrial analysis values of coal.
煤。采用中国生产线中统计值，大中型预分解窑的标煤耗为114kg/t熟料，同时根据煤灰的化学成分以及煤的工业分析值，可对煤的消耗量进行计算。
Blast furnace slag. The standard values of GB-175-2007 General Portland Cement in China are used for each component of the cement.
粒化高炉矿渣。各通用水泥组分使用中国GB-175-2007通用硅酸盐水泥标准值。

Electricity consumption. The average level of domestic electricity consumption in China is used. For dry-process cement production lines, the electricity consumption for milling operations accounts for more than 60% of the total electricity consumption, with raw material milling accounting for about 30% and cement milling accounting for about 40%. Due to limited data on raw material mining, a simplified treatment is adopted for various raw materials, and the electricity consumption data of 13.89 kWh/t raw materials are used. For different types of blended cement, the electricity consumption for milling different raw materials varies due to differences in their shapes and properties. The estimation is based on the percentage of electricity consumption for milling raw materials in the United States.
电耗。中国国内电力消耗平均水平。对于干法水泥生产线，粉磨作业消耗的电力占全部电力消耗的60%以上，其中生料粉磨约占30%，水泥粉磨约占40%。由于原料开采数据有限，对各种原料合并进行简化处理，采用电力消耗数据13.89kwh/t原料。对于不同品种的混合水泥，出于原材料形状、性质的差异，粉磨不同原料所消耗的电力不同，根据美国粉磨原料消耗电力百分比进行估计计算。

CO2. The CO2 emissions during the cement production stage come from two parts: one is the decomposition of calcium carbonate and magnesium carbonate in the raw materials during the calcination process, and the other is the release of CO2 from coal combustion as fuel. The formulas for CO2 emissions from raw materials are: CaCO3→CaO+CO2; MgCO3→MgO+CO2. The emission factor for CO2 from coal combustion is based on the carbon emission coefficient from the Chinese Academy of Engineering, which is 2.4933 kg CO2 per kg of standard coal.
CO2。水泥生产阶段二氧化碳排放来自两个部分，一部分为煅烧时原料中碳酸钙和碳酸镁的分解释放，另一部分为燃料煤燃烧释放。原料中排放二氧化碳公式： CaCO3→Cao+CO2；MgCO3→Mgo+CO2。煤燃烧的二氧化碳释放量采用中国工程院的碳排放系数，CO2排放系数为2.4933kgCO2/(kg标准煤)。
SO2. The emission of SO2 is based on the results of the first national survey of pollution sources in the Chinese cement industry (SO2 0.066kg/t clinker).
SO2。SO2排放量来自第一次中国水泥制造业污染源普查结果（SO20.066kg/t熟料）。
NOx. The emission of NOx is based on the results of the first national survey of pollution sources in the Chinese cement industry (NOx 1.584kg/t clinker).
NOx。NOx排放量来自第一次中国水泥制造业污染源普查结果（NOx1.584kg/t熟料）。

Dust, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter. The emissions of dust during cement production are based on the upper limit values of the Chinese cement industry atmospheric pollutant emission standards. According to the dust emission concentration from different equipment in cement production, the dust emission quantity from each production stage can be calculated. Among them, the dust emission from raw material grinding accounts for approximately 55% of the total, cement grinding accounts for about 20%, coal preparation stage accounts for 13%, and clinker calcination process accounts for 12%.
粉尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。水泥生产过程中粉尘的排放数据采用中国水泥工业大气污染物排放标准的上限值。根据水泥生产不同设备的粉尘排放浓度计算水泥生产过程中各个生产阶段的粉尘排放量，其中生料粉磨排放粉尘浓度约占55%，水泥粉磨约占 20%，煤粉制备阶段占 13%，煅烧过程占12%。
COD. The emission of COD is based on the results of the first national survey of pollution sources in the Chinese cement industry (COD 0.06g/t clinker).
COD。COD排放量来自第一次中国水泥制造业污染源普查结果（COD0.06g/t熟料）。

油
